EmailTemplate.subject: Re: You're invited to become a contributor on Envato Elements
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.00N6F00000GPn2N},
I wanted to follow up to see if you've had a chance to review the offer I sent you a few weeks ago about becoming a contributor on Elements.
Please reply and let me know to confirm your interest and progress to the next stage.
To remind you of the offer: Elements is a new product by Envato offering a subscription service for digital assets. Elements offers a carefully curated selection of high quality graphic design assets to a target audience of agencies, designers, corporate marketers and other professionals with a regular need for high quality assets.
For you, this represents a great opportunity to reach new customers and earn more revenue.
Why should I join Envato Elements?
Be part of a strictly limited group of high-quality contributors Elements is non-exclusive - Earn extra money on top of your existing earnings. Reach a new high-end audience, including agencies, marketers, & designers. Your items are beautifully presented. One simple commercial license to help reach as wide an audience as possible. Massive promotion - our biggest ongoing marketing spend ever. In the next few weeks our focus will be on promoting Web Fonts, so now is a good to time to join!
As a contributor on Envato Elements, you’ll share in 50% of the net revenue from subscribers, revenue is divided using the Subscriber Share method. From our side, we are making a heavy investment in marketing & promotion to attract a large new audience of design professionals, as well as tapping into Envato’s huge existing channels.
What do I have to do to participate?
At this stage, all you need to do is express your interest in participating. We’ll then provide more information to help you make an informed decision.
Just hit reply now and let us know you’re interested!
We'd love to have you as a contributor and look forward to hearing from you shortly.
Thanks! Shane Freer Envato Elements shane.freer@envato.com envato.com
This email and its attachments may contain confidential information. If you have received this email in error, I'd appreciate you letting me know and deleting it.
